name: property_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zillow.
Tool description: Fast and highly available API. For-sale, rental listings and agens real-time data from Zillow.
API description: Fetches property details from the Zillow API.

zpid.description: The Zillow Property ID. Defaults to None.

property_url.description: The URL of the property on Zillow. Defaults to 'https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/101-California-Ave-UNIT-303-Santa-Monica-CA-90403/20485700_zpid/'.
